org.springframework.data.redis.core

接口 BoundGeoOperations<K,M>

  • 所有超级接口:
    BoundKeyOperations<K>

    public interface BoundGeoOperations<K,M>
extends BoundKeyOperations<K>
    GeoOperations bound to a certain key.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.8

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 已过时的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Long add(Iterable<RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation<M>> locations)
      Add RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocations to key
      Long add(Map<M,org.springframework.data.geo.Point> memberCoordinateMap)
      Add Map of member / Point pairs to key.
      Long add(org.springframework.data.geo.Point point, M member)
      Add Point with given member name to key.
      Long add(RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation<M> location)
      Add RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation to key.
      org.springframework.data.geo.Distance distance(M member1, M member2)
      Get the Distance between member1 and member2.
      org.springframework.data.geo.Distance distance(M member1, M member2, org.springframework.data.geo.Metric metric)
      Get the Distance between member1 and member2 in the given Metric.
      default Long geoAdd(Iterable<RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation<M>> locations)
      已过时。 
      since 2.0, use add(Iterable).
      default Long geoAdd(Map<M,org.springframework.data.geo.Point> memberCoordinateMap)
      已过时。 
      since 2.0, use add(Map).
      default Long geoAdd(org.springframework.data.geo.Point point, M member)
      已过时。 
      since 2.0, use add(Point, Object).
      default Long geoAdd(RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation<M> location)
      已过时。 
      since 2.0, use #add(GeoLocation).
      default org.springframework.data.geo.Distance geoDist(M member1, M member2)
      已过时。 
      since 2.0, use distance(Object, Object).
      default org.springframework.data.geo.Distance geoDist(M member1, M member2, org.springframework.data.geo.Metric metric)
      已过时。 
      since 2.0, use distance(Object, Object, Metric).
      default List<String> geoHash(M... members)
      已过时。 
      since 2.0, use hash(Object[]).
      default List<org.springframework.data.geo.Point> geoPos(M... members)
      已过时。 
      since 2.0, use position(Object[]).
      default org.springframework.data.geo.GeoResults<RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation<M>> geoRadius(org.springframework.data.geo.Circle within)
      已过时。 
      since 2.0, use radius(Circle).
      default org.springframework.data.geo.GeoResults<RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation<M>> geoRadius(org.springframework.data.geo.Circle within, RedisGeoCommands.GeoRadiusCommandArgs args)
      已过时。 
      since 2.0, use #radius(Circle, GeoRadiusCommandArgs).
      default org.springframework.data.geo.GeoResults<RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation<M>> geoRadiusByMember(K key, M member, double radius)
      已过时。 
      since 2.0, use radius(Object, Object, double).
      default org.springframework.data.geo.GeoResults<RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation<M>> geoRadiusByMember(M member, org.springframework.data.geo.Distance distance)
      已过时。 
      since 2.0, use radius(Object, Distance).
      default org.springframework.data.geo.GeoResults<RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation<M>> geoRadiusByMember(M member, org.springframework.data.geo.Distance distance, RedisGeoCommands.GeoRadiusCommandArgs args)
      已过时。 
      since 2.0, use #radius(Object, Distance, GeoRadiusCommandArgs).
      default Long geoRemove(M... members)
      已过时。 
      since 2.0, use remove(Object[]).
      List<String> hash(M... members)
      Get Geohash representation of the position for one or more members.
      List<org.springframework.data.geo.Point> position(M... members)
      Get the Point representation of positions for one or more members.
      org.springframework.data.geo.GeoResults<RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation<M>> radius(org.springframework.data.geo.Circle within)
      Get the members within the boundaries of a given Circle.
      org.springframework.data.geo.GeoResults<RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation<M>> radius(org.springframework.data.geo.Circle within, RedisGeoCommands.GeoRadiusCommandArgs args)
      Get the members within the boundaries of a given Circle applying RedisGeoCommands.GeoRadiusCommandArgs.
      org.springframework.data.geo.GeoResults<RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation<M>> radius(K key, M member, double radius)
      Get the members within the circle defined by the members coordinates and given radius.
      org.springframework.data.geo.GeoResults<RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation<M>> radius(M member, org.springframework.data.geo.Distance distance)
      Get the members within the circle defined by the members coordinates and given radius applying Metric.
      org.springframework.data.geo.GeoResults<RedisGeoCommands.GeoLocation<M>> radius(M member, org.springframework.data.geo.Distance distance, RedisGeoCommands.GeoRadiusCommandArgs args)
      Get the members within the circle defined by the members coordinates and given radius applying Metric and RedisGeoCommands.GeoRadiusCommandArgs.
      Long remove(M... members)
      Remove the members.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.springframework.data.redis.core.BoundKeyOperations

        expire, expireAt, getExpire, getKey, getType, persist, rename

      • add

        @Nullable
Long add(org.springframework.data.geo.Point point,
                   M member)
        Add Point with given member name to key.
        参数:
        point - must not be null.
        member - must not be null.
        返回:
        Number of elements added. null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: GEOADD
